Entry.JapaneseText: それにしても、普通の<Yellow>ヒト<White>を操って 攻撃してくるなんて、ちょっとヒドイんじゃない？
Entry.EnglishText: Don't you think it's terrible that Walto hypnotized innocent <Yellow>Human beings<White> into attacking us like that?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……いや、あれは奴の デモンストレーションに過ぎない。
俺たちが彼らを攻撃できない事も、真相を見抜き 暗示を解く事も、すべてワルトゥの計算の上だ。
Entry.EnglishText: It was well calculated. He knew we wouldn't fight back and that we would dispel the hypnosis.

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……ワルトゥは悪い人じゃないんだよネ。 戦いたくないなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: I see... So Walto isn't really a bad guy. I hope we don't have to fight him...
